name: Athlos
description: Reserve your favorite sports facilities, hire personal trainers, and enlist game officials to oversee your next match.

meta.fullDescription: Reserve your favorite sports facilities, hire personal trainers, and enlist game officials to oversee your next match.   Development was distributed into 5 two-week sprints utilizing an Agile workflow.

header.alt: Screenshot of Athlos Booking Management's index page. The header reads 'The #1 Sports Booking Platform. Athlos is the easiest way to reserve sports facilities on campus. Sign up free.'

name: ‘We will always outlive the people who hate us’
description: Antisemitic incidents reached an all-time high in the U.S. in 2021.

featureImage.alt: Maya Goldenberg lights candles prior to Shabbat, the seventh day of rest, at the beginning of Sukkot.
